doc:
Adrianna Bertola https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrianna_Bertola 0 Adrianna Jean Bertola (born 9 February 1999) is an English actress and singer who rose to attention playing Gretl von Trapp in The Sound of Music and Sharice Brooks in Casualty. She also played Violet Beauregarde in Charlie and the Chocolate Factory the Musical from May to November 2013. On 22 September 2014, Bertola released her first single, titled "Fire and Ice", through the Spirit Young Performers Company. Adrianna_Jean_Bertola ( born_9_February_1999 ) is an_English_actress and singer who rose to attention_playing_Gretl_von_Trapp in The_Sound of Music and Sharice_Brooks in Casualty . She also played Violet_Beauregarde in Charlie and the_Chocolate_Factory the_Musical from May to November_2013 . On 22_September_2014 , Bertola released her_first_single , titled "_Fire_and_Ice_" , through the_Spirit_Young_Performers_Company .
